mapper.select: SELECT id, title, price, description, category, image FROM products
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Products (title, price, description, category, image, rating_rate, rating_count) VALUES (#{title}, #{price}, #{description}, #{category}, #{image}, #{ratingRate}, #{ratingCount})
mapper.update: UPDATE Products SET title = #{title}, price = #{price}, description = #{description}, category = #{category}, image = #{image}, rating_rate = #{ratingRate}, rating_count = #{ratingCount} WHERE id = #{id}
